website_summaries.verdict: Much more than an alkaline machine, this reverse osmosis under-the-sink system clears 99% of contaminants.
pros: Adds high purity calcium back to the water for an ideal pH
Comes with an attractive, chrome-finished faucet
Easy installation with great customer service for any troubleshooting
Glowing reviews of ppm dropping drastically after using this product
cons: Water comes out slow, and without much pressure, from the faucet

customer_reviews.title: Great System, Good Price, Good Instructions for DIY
customer_reviews.text: I had a previous system professionally installed. In my new house I decided to do it myself. The instructions were well done. All the needed parts were included. If you want to hook this to your ice maker you will need an additional T fitting and additional tubing. All the plumbing fittings were great quality. Great price and made in USA. That brings me a little more comfort considering you are using this for drinking water. I also purchased this Apec faucet to compliment my stainless steel faucet: Water tastes great. With the minerals added back I am at 20 PPM. Regular tap water is reading 190 to 200 PPM.
customer_reviews.author: Troy F.

customer_reviews.title: "Free" Drinking water comes at a price, but is worth it
customer_reviews.text: Overall, it functions well and was pretty easy to put together, though I had some experience with similar water systems. I was not impressed with the bracket upon which everything is mounted. As you add the filters and fill them up, the bracket sags. I mounted mine with a chain supporting the weight. I feel this is a fairly significant design flaw by omission and should be corrected. Finishing touches for me were a slide-out mechanism and mineral 'filter' as a final stage. Installed it with a dishwasher/RO type.air gap and have had no problems.
customer_reviews.author: JA

customer_reviews.title: Expensive installation
customer_reviews.text: Think before you buy, the installation costs twice the price of the product
customer_reviews.author: No name

customer_reviews.title: Buy this. It’s worth the investment!
customer_reviews.text: I live in West Texas and you just don’t drink the water here. We have been buying RO water to fill 5 gallon jugs for ages and just had enough of that hassle. This took my husband 1 hour by himself to install. No issues what so ever. We did have to empty the tank 3 times before we got clear water, but that may be normal after we read other reviews. The water tastes the same as bottled from the store. We are VERY satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Water
customer_reviews.text: Our water just got substantially better. Our village water smells like a swimming pool and this APEC RO system fixed it. Good, fair price for the value. Installation can be a bit challenging in crowded spaces especially tightening the sink top water faucet. APEC offers a special wrench that was not mentioned in the instructions that I ordered after the fact.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: WONDERFULLY clean water
customer_reviews.text: We live in an area where the waters mells and tastes HORRIBLE (and I generally have no problem drinking tap water anywhere). So an RO filter is essential in our house. We've had RO filters in the past that were soooooo slow. This one works incredibly well, not only the RO filtering process to give us smell free, great tasting water, but we are able to fill our 3 quart pitchers in under a minute. Having the calcium filter is nice to add that back to the water, yet we also use mineral drops because the one thing about RO filters is they filter out EVERYTHING including the good minerals your body needs.
customer_reviews.author: JWI

customer_reviews.title: A little setup goes a long way
customer_reviews.text: We got this during a lightning deal for a fantastic price. We set this up within an hour and had to reseat the hoses to address leaks, but once we set it up, it's been a fantastic option. Water tastes amazing. Way better than the Brita filter we were using prior. Just note that when you setup, you will want to completely fill up the bladder and empty all the way. The instructions say that you only have to do it once or twice, but we had to do it 4 times until we removed the filmy taste. After that, it has been magical.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Cheeseman

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting water, but very complicated to install. You will need a professional
customer_reviews.text: This water filter makes great-tasting water. I noticed the difference immediately. The water that comes from this filter is better than store-bought filtered water, it hasn't been sitting on the shelf in a plastic container for months. The only downside is installation unless you are a super handy DIY person, you will have to get a professional to install this. I'm also concerned about changing the filters, that doesn't look so easy either. However, all in all, this is a great product at a very reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Edward

customer_reviews.title: Need to have better packaging of parts
customer_reviews.text: The most important part, the sleeve that stops water leaking from the water line to filter is packaged inconspicuously and is very easy to miss, and was therefore missed during Install. It caused the entire house to flood. When called the support, instead of helping they wanted Proof of purchase to send replacement. 1 month later, still no filtered water. Support can do a little better.
customer_reviews.author: Randy macho Man Savage

customer_reviews.title: Water tastes GREAT!! but if you shake the unit by accident you get some kind of sediment.
customer_reviews.text: Its really odd.. i tried to check the date and saw some tiny light colored particles floating in water. eventually I ran it and it dissappeared but waht was it!! i called the company. Even so, the water is fing AMAZING. i actually switched from sugary drinks to water because of this system. IT changed my life literally, and probably saved me at least 10 years or from diabetes.
customer_reviews.author: xxmmaa

customer_reviews.title: Better tasting than the best filtered bottled water.
customer_reviews.text: I had been tossing around the idea of a reverse osmosis unit for some time. I had been utilizing carbon filters alone under counter for years but since we had switched I cannot believe the flavor. Everyone who comes over cannot believe how smooth and flavorful the water is. I cannot make a bigger recommendation for a product that has exceeded our expectations. We had our 2nd baby and wanted something with improved water over the previous filters and this is amazing. We are able to utilize the water for baby formula safely and quickly. We love this product
customer_reviews.author: GetOutdoorsNow

customer_reviews.title: Excellent water and cost saving features.
customer_reviews.text: We used a Watts Premier water purification system for years. We began having problems with their product quality control and customer support people so we decided to go with APEC and what a major difference. The Watts Premier water had a somewhat sweeter taste but the APEC water is very good and we have no complaints. Changing filters with Watts if pretty frequent with Watts but not so with APEC which is a major cost saving feature. I highly recommend the APEC over anything else on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Great quality product
customer_reviews.text: I had a professional install this because it was free with installation of my water softening system so I can’t say much about that but I can compare it to the $800 RO system we left at our old house and this is the same in quality if not better. Everyone always compliments the taste of our water and I can feel good about cooking with it and giving it to my children because we all know they’re trying to keep us sick with fluoride and other additives in our drinking water. Regular filters will not get rid of the fluoride so this is a great affordable option to protect the health of your family.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: APEC for the win
customer_reviews.text: I hooked up the system in about an hour. I experienced no leaks as other people said they did. I took the advice of another reviewer and ran the system for 15 minutes before connecting the tank. The quality of this system is impressive, not to mention I got an additional year of warranty for registering my product. The water tastes good! I went with the ROES 75 PH and the added minerals are a plus for me since I'm not big on plain/bland water. I definitely would recommend the APEC brand for a water filtration system.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the taste of our water now!
customer_reviews.text: Totally recommend this product. We've been buying bottled water for drinking due to high levels of hardness in our tap water. Our old water filter was an under sink regular triple filter system. Though it did a good job with scent (ie no chlorine smell) the water comes out tasting a bit slimy for our liking. We only used it for cooking. With the APEC RO unit, the water comes out tasting crisp! I think it's comparable to Dasanti or ?Kandiohi?.
customer_reviews.author: Dragon_dude

customer_reviews.title: Amazing water
customer_reviews.text: I bought this RO system because I was having a number of problems from another company’s basic 3 stage filter system, taste and questionable purity among them. I purchased this system from Apec because it’s made in the USA, has the remineralization filter, and according to fakespot, has a high percentage of real reviews. We love, and highly recommend this RO system. Our water tastes great and tests very clean with a TDS meter. The RO water is at about 14 ppm vs tap water at about 240.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler B.

customer_reviews.title: Not good quality parts.
customer_reviews.text: System does job well but some parts could be made better. I had lot of trouble with male needle valve which connects inlet water supply to the 1st filter. This needle valve actually broke after I installed the system and when I woke up next day we had water all over the kitchen. Also one of the "quick connect" that is used to connect final tube to faucet was constantly leaking and I had to use alternate mechanism provided in kit to connect this tube. APEC shipped replacement part for the needle valve which broke but I had to deal with kitchen full of water!
customer_reviews.author: A1122

customer_reviews.title: Best decision ever made
customer_reviews.text: The system is surprisingly easy to install. I was little intimidated at fist, then I followed step by step instructions, before I knew it was done. No leaks at all, just follow instructions. Our water pressure is pretty good, so I am getting at 3 gallons per hour. Water tests pretty good. Tap water TDS (total dissolved solids) measured at 40, after filtration it went down to 7 Tap water pH value 7.2, after filtration pH was enhanced to 9 Filters were marked as made in USA, some parts were marked as made in Taiwan. Suggestion - flush your tank 3 to 4 times before start using the water. We noticed strong taste even after flushing 2 tank.
customer_reviews.author: Kishore

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Water Filter
customer_reviews.text: Water filter seems to be of great quality. Obviously I cannot rate or review the actual quality of the water (apart from the vendor's certificates) unless I ship the water to a 3rd party for testing. The installation instructions were very detailed and easy to follow. If this is your first home project, I would suggest reading the instructions first and mapping out exactly how you're going to install it and where everything will be placed before tackling the installation. The water tastes great- even better cold.
customer_reviews.author: H Family

customer_reviews.title: Unlimited Mineral water at Home
customer_reviews.text: Customer support responded and send the replacement ph filter. TDS is now 13ppm constant for every glass of water. Water taste with calcium filter is excellent, my heart burning and constipation problem stopped since I started drinking this RO mineral water. No burning sensation anymore while urinating. Good water for kidney and urethra bladder function. I drink a glass every hour. APEC customer service was supportive. Thanks APEC
customer_reviews.author: Electronics lover

customer_reviews.title: Great taste in a hard-water region
customer_reviews.text: This unit completely eliminated the need to buy bottled water. Relatively easy to install, just takes a little patience. Don't assume this is uncomplicated. Also, Reverse Osmosis water is pretty much mineral free, so the characteristics of the water will tend to draw good minerals out of your body, so it's probably a good idea to supplement minerals in your diet. Our coffee maker and tea pot both love the lack of deposits now. All in all, it's worth the $$ and time.
customer_reviews.author: Gary M

customer_reviews.title: Easy Install! So far so good! Water tastes good!
customer_reviews.text: Tastes very similar to Smartwater. Installation was simple as can be. Hardest part was drilling the hole to mount the faucet. My suggestion would be NOT to cut the excess water lines shorter, so that you'll have some slack when it comes time to change out the filters. Ordered a PPM/TDS/PH meter and will be testing/comparing the regular faucet water & the newly filtered RO'ed PH'ed H2o!!! Thanks Amazon Prime Day for the extra discount!
customer_reviews.author: Lucky Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous water
customer_reviews.text: We have used 5 gallon refill jugs for a few years and got tired of lugging those heavy bottles, so I installed this purifier. The water tastes amazing, looks crystal clear, and is a huge improvement from our city water, which is very hard water.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Pure glacier water taste !
customer_reviews.text: This think makes the water taste like you collected the water off a pure glacier ! I don’t know how it’s so cold too when it comes out . I have a plumber friend who installed it for me . No way I would have been able to do it ! It’s already paid for itself with how much we love it .
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Alkaline filter makes a huge difference!
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought the more popular 5 stage system (ESSENCE ROES-50) but it made the water taste like distilled water. For a few dollars more, this system is leaps and bounds above the 5 stage system in terms of taste. The instructions are good and the install was fairly simple, if you can tighten a nut and drill a hole, you can install this system. Quality connections made setup simple and clean, no leaks. I wish the faucet came in a brushed aluminum/nickel finish instead of chrome, most modern homes won't have a chrome faucet and sink to match it.
customer_reviews.author: PD

customer_reviews.title: Water tastes great, installation instructions were accurate
customer_reviews.text: This wasn't an "easy" installation, but the instructions were very accurate. It helped to have 2 people, one to install and one to follow directions and prep the parts. It was worth it, though, because the water is great. Also, several reviews talked about low water flow. We don't have any problem with that at all. It isn't as strong as the regular faucet, but it is a steady flow.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: I have only had this setup two days now, and can already tell how big of a difference there is in quality of water! No chlorine taste at all, just pure water. I installed this into my refrigerator, and with the added tank, the water pressure is always high and fills your glass of water much faster than without(think a couple seconds vs 30+). It also comes with its own faucet to hook into your sink alon with the fittings to hook it up to the system, and came with a very detailed picture on how the system is setup, along with a step by step guide in the manual if you really need it. Setup was really fast aswell.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin s

customer_reviews.title: One word - wow...
customer_reviews.text: Bought it to fight high PPM in California water. I was suspicious about reviews, it's easy to buy them these days, but after opening the box and installing it I'm adding another 5+... Well... connections are a bit flimsy, but looks like it's pretty enough to handle the pressure. Technically, the output is semi-distilled water with additives from calcium cartridge to prevent calcium wash-out from your body. The tea tastes very good, no comparison with Brita, Berkey and another carbon filters (in my case, for good tap water - carbon filters works good).
customer_reviews.author: Amaz0ner

customer_reviews.title: I am allergic to the coconut carbon filter!
customer_reviews.text: Once I emptied and filed the unit twice, I had my first glass of water, and it felt gritty. Later, my mouth started stinging and my lips started going numb. I switched back regular water and am feeling fine now. Is there a different stage 6 filter I can replace the coconut filter with. Maybe we could replace it with an Apec 5-TCR-QC10 inch inline 1/4 inch quick connect? Would this be possible? Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Leilani Wright Jay

customer_reviews.title: clean water
customer_reviews.text: Great unit for those with crappy water. Its the best water I've found to drink. I teed the faucet line to the ice maker, and also get clear, no taste cubes. I had the 5 stage setup in previously, so just used the same tubes to hook up the new unit. 20 minutes and I'm filling the tank for the first flush. Update: TDS went from 404 ppm tap water, to 17 ppm out of the unit.
customer_reviews.author: baitmaster

customer_reviews.title: Clean water, even after boiling!
customer_reviews.text: I live in Utah where the water always has a fine, white silt, even after filtering. Brita, Pur, it did not matter, our kettle was being destroyed by the silt. We were buying bottles of distilled water before I got this filter. We now have plain water, from the tap. Silt no more! Installing it took a full afternoon, possible because I have a high attention to detail. I love this filter!!!
customer_reviews.author: Antoinette

customer_reviews.title: I Love the taste!
customer_reviews.text: The only Con to this system is the amount of water it takes to filter out one gallon but that's going to be the same for all reverse osmosis systems. It roughly makes one gallon to every 5.5 gallons wasted, although Apec claims a bit less wasted water I measured it several times. Other than that the system works great, the water tastes excellent and I ran a second line to my refrigerator without any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie F

customer_reviews.title: Easy
customer_reviews.text: I moved to a new home and installed a whole-house water purification system, but the water quality in Houston was too poor. We still couldn't adapt to the unfiltered water. We had to go to the supermarket to buy purified water until we bought ROES. The installation is easy and can be completed by one person in less than an hour.
customer_reviews.author: W1 MOTORSPORTS

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint is that the tubing supplied is on the short side. Unless your assembly is within 3 feet, you'll want to get some extra tuning and couplers to go along with this system. And if you want both the faucet AND an ice maker to be supplied, order a few more parts at the same time. For my installation (which took about 3 hrs including removing a dishwasher and drilling several holes in the back of my cabinets), I ended up spending an extra $20 on parts. But I have no regrets and love the new water!
customer_reviews.author: StrongBadSmith

customer_reviews.title: Water tasted well, with low particles per volume reading
customer_reviews.text: - Installation instructions were well written. Did not have any major problems during installation. - The water tasted good, not as good as the water I bought from the local water store, but ok - Tested the number of particles per volume (liter) and the number was higher than the water store bought water; lower number is better BTW
customer_reviews.author: Hopper

customer_reviews.title: What a difference this made
customer_reviews.text: Was easy to install and made a world of difference on the water's taste and quality. We have well water and when I tested it came in at 200. After installing this device, them test er read 39.0 That is a huge difference, but the taste is what blew me away. Better than bottled water and cheaper for sure. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Fiore

customer_reviews.title: Tank and spout valve leak
customer_reviews.text: I put it all together everything went as planned. I turned on all the water and 2 things are wrong. The off valve on the top of the tank doesn’t quite shut off. The water spout doesn’t completely shut off either. I’ll be calling support when they are open to see if they replace the defective parts. Although support never responded or answered the leaky valves stopped leaking after a few days.
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Bought to replace an older unit that had seen better days. Was very simple to install and even matched the existing mounting screws. Had several upgrades from unit we were replacing that made installation super easy. Water taste is great and would recommend this unit. My only complaint is that the yellow line for the pressure tank could be a little longer.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Sweet as mineral
customer_reviews.text: I quit drinking tap water and relied on bottled water (Years ago when we moved to morris county where water hardness and taste isnt what i was used to). Since we got this system i have been able to cutdown on plastic bottle purchase, water tastes same as kirkland purified water if not better. Im loving it.
customer_reviews.author: Chi

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting water
customer_reviews.text: Bought this system to replaced my old water filtration system. The installation was not easy if you don’t have the right tools. I am not a handy person so the instruction is actually confusing for me. Anyhow, my husband was able to connect the system easily because our previous water system was installed by a professional. Switching out the system is fairly easy as all the tubes are the same. I opted to get this with the Alkaine filter simply because I love the water taste. No complaint at all. Loving my new RO water system. However, the installation was not easy if I don’t have a professional to installed my previous system.
customer_reviews.author: kristy78

customer_reviews.title: Easy, clean, but PPM is around 103
customer_reviews.text: Overall it was pretty easy to install, took me about 30 minutes. I ended up splitting the output to run separate lines to my refrigerator, and one to my coffee machine. The only complaint, is the ppm is high. The straight tap water tests at 330-340, water from the RO tests at 102-104. Past RO systems tested below 30, so not sure if I just need to replace the filters. I did add the watts permeate pump from the start, so maybe that's why it is testing high?
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Amazing water
customer_reviews.text: This is by far one of the best additions to our house. The plants and fish enjoy it too. We got this setup so we had all the connection pieces, but can leave off stages if we want. In particular stage 6. You need a little bit of experience to install this since a hole is drilled into the drain pipe for the drain line and a couple other things could be tricky without skill.
customer_reviews.author: DN Mead

customer_reviews.title: Drinkable water!
customer_reviews.text: This system does a great job improving drinkability. We have very hard water with high sediment from a well and a whole-home filter and softener but we were still drinking bottled water since the softened water was not good for drinking. I hooked this up to our fridge supply and it's been great having drinkable water from the tap again. Now we can skip the expense, hassle, and impact of the bottled water. The install was simple. The directions were easy to follow. Generally they are pretty useless with most things these days so that was nice.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathon M

customer_reviews.title: Great system so far!
customer_reviews.text: Installation wasn't hard at all...took a few hours I'd say and pay attention to the directions! We've been using this system for a couple of months or so and it's working well. I have found, although it's a 4 gallon capacity tank, that you can fill two one-gallon jugs with adequate pressure and then I wait to fill more as it slows down a lot after that, but it produces excellent RO water. We purchased this RO water filter system for marine reef aquarium water, and it produces plenty for our daily needs including ice and drinking water as well We test the water frequently due to the primary use, and so far it's working perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: jmco

customer_reviews.title: Better have 6 Stage than 5 Stage
customer_reviews.text: My family search for a under counter filter system for our new kitchen. We visit several water company nearby and listen to their introduction. Then we figure instead of buying from those company and let them install for us. We saved the labor cost and brought a upgrade 6 stage system instead of 5 stage. We watch the installation video from youtube and APEC product come with a very detail installation guideline with different color code (tube) for different connection. This system have better flow and big enough tank that our 4 person family never need to wait for water preparation. My family really like the Alkaline stage that make the water favorable like spring water.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: The water finally tastes good. My previous APEC no RO system does not ...
customer_reviews.text: The water finally tastes good. My previous APEC no RO system does not work well for my tap water, tap water reads 460ppm impurity, after filter it still reads 460, I only used it for half a year and the system is supposed to work for two years. New RO system, works well, final water reads 40, it taste better than COSTCO bottled water. Since I am upgrading system, connection and clean-up only takes only 20 minutes. I only need drill an extra hole on waste water pipe, connect the fitting, everything fit in half the under-sink cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: Fang Wen

customer_reviews.title: Great water taste
customer_reviews.text: It was fairly simple to install and the water has a great taste. My family and I noticed an improvement in the quality of our water almost immediately. Great product for the money. Warning! It will make bottled water less appealing. You will miss your APEC if you travel as we have found out first hand. I highly recommend it
customer_reviews.author: J Funk

customer_reviews.title: APEC has a great product backed by great customer service
customer_reviews.text: When I first received this, filtration system, I installed it, worked great but leaked from Stage 1 to Stage 2 and from stage 2 to stage 3 (the nipples in-between). APEC contacted me via email and asked for me to write a review. I said I was going to hold off until the leaking was resolved. They we're very proactive about it. They wanted pictures, pressure readings to make sure it wasn't anything on my end. They sent out a lab tested replacement part. In the end, no leaks! Thank you APEC!
customer_reviews.author: Brian L.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this RO system. I have had other Apec systems and the quality continues to be reliable. This system has more components than most so will likely be more difficult to reconnect after replacing filters if you are not careful about keeping track of the connections as you remove them.
customer_reviews.author: heather

customer_reviews.title: Poorly designed
customer_reviews.text: poor quality water not design for family use one cup at the time.
customer_reviews.author: Ahmad Mesdaq

customer_reviews.title: your friends will want to bring coolers of this stuff home
customer_reviews.text: I honestly had no idea drinking water run through something like this would turn out this way, or I'd have picked one up 15 years ago. Trust me, zero buyers remorse. And my water here in CO is rated an 86/100 on those little public test results things. Water goes in, magic comes out.
customer_reviews.author: omgerd yay buying stuff

customer_reviews.title: Crisp bottled water taste.
customer_reviews.text: Water is delicious with minerals put back in through the alkaline. Our water is bad in Vegas - can’t drink or cook with it. This is our 4th RO unit over the years. Typically RO water tastes flat. So glad we got this unit with minerals added back in. We think it tastes like Figi water. There’s a definite crispness that’s so refreshing. Super happy we bought this one. Delivery was quick. Can’t report on ease of install. We hired plumber. Would have preferred a brushed nickel or stainless faucet. The one in the box is chrome.
customer_reviews.author: Boodoodle

customer_reviews.title: 2nd house using same filtration system
customer_reviews.text: Good tasting water. The water flow a little show, but I suppose that is to be expected from am RO filter setup. It takes up a lot of space underneath the sink. The bladder in the tank doesn't leak which is a great thing. Easy to install and the directions are clear. The hoses are even colored to avoid confusion.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this for sever months so far, and have no complaints. Install was easy with the directions and video tutorials. It doesn’t take up too much room under the sink. The water tastes crisp and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Great water, easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Water quality from this unit is excellent. This thing is half the cost and double the quality of one I had installed by a local water softener company years ago. Since there are six filters, it is larger and took up more cabinet space. Recovery time is very fast compared to what I had previously. Easy to install. Would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Ron M

customer_reviews.title: I also installed it with a permeate pump to aid in speed of filling pump and to reduce wasted water used during purification pro
customer_reviews.text: I installed this in the basement to save room under the kitchen sink. I also installed it with a permeate pump to aid in speed of filling pump and to reduce wasted water used during purification process. This was easy to install with clear directions. Product seems to be pretty robust but it's only been in use for 2 months now. So time will tell how robust it is in long run. Water quality is great. My wife is very picky about water and she enjoys this. System provides plenty of water to run to both refrigerator, ice maker, and faucet for two people and a dog.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Bowman

customer_reviews.title: Fairly Easy to Install.  Tastes Good.  Relieved Allergies!
customer_reviews.text: So glad I purchased this unit. Installing took me a couple hours with the help of a friend. Overall not too bad, but having someone who is somewhat familiar with plumbing helps. Taste was okay at first, took some getting used to for me, everyone else in my house liked it right away. Biggest thing I noticed was that my allergies (nasal) started clearing up within a day or two of only drinking RO water. I thought it was weird but some reading only indicated I could have been allergic to something in the water the whole time. It’s been like 4 weeks and it’s been consistently better, where I haven’t needed to take Zyrtec!
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Good, clean water.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace the old RO system we had. We had a plumber do the install while he set up the other kitchen stuff, so I can’t speak to ease of install. Water flavor is great, and the easy filter replacement is one of the main reasons we purchased this unit.
customer_reviews.author: Hedgemoe

customer_reviews.title: missing items
customer_reviews.text: I ask handy man to install for me. We discover missing one small washer and another washer is too big. Very disappointed. However, I do not want to exchange new one because I do not want to ask handyman to come again. Just buy washer by myself. Hope it will not leak in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Yeying Jiang

customer_reviews.title: Have to have
customer_reviews.text: Nice, simple system that treats our Florida Panhandle water very nicely. No chlorine, bad smell, taste, or color in the water now. Our water tastes great! Filters last about a year for a three-bedroom (2 adults, one child) home.
customer_reviews.author: Kamau5

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic drinking water system
customer_reviews.text: We bought this product to install under our kitchen sink for drinking water. We live in the city and wanted to avoid all the added chemicals and bad taste that comes with city water. We were previously buying filtered water every week from Wal-mart and the convenience of this system is well worth the investment! It fits nicely under a normal-sized kitchen sink. The included faucet is good quality. The water tastes good! Our only complaint is that even after a month of use, there are still millions of tiny bubbles coming out with the water. They don't cause a problem, but are noticeable in a glass of water.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic replacement for pitcher filter; no more worries about heavy metals
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I live in an older city and was worried about lead in the water. This is what brought me to reverse osmosis. Based on my research, this is the best reverse osmosis system for the scale. It was easy to install, works great and taste great. The construction seems durable. I am very happy to not being filling up a pitcher anymore. If you are still filling a pitcher filter, I recommend you seriously consider this unit. Normally you would mount the discharge to the drain pipe (those parts are included), but I just have the tube run up and into the sink. I didn't want to mess with the pipes since I rent an apartment.
customer_reviews.author: Hugger

customer_reviews.title: Great system. Great price.
customer_reviews.text: We moved into a home and completely remodeled the kitchen. We were told when we move to this area that our water was really good and we would not need a water filter system. We looked at the cost of this system, however, and decided to risk the cost to see if we could make good water even better. We found that though our local water was good this system gave it a much better taste. It's used daily for drinking water, coffee, tea and anything else that we consume. We love the system and would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Tastes as Good as Store Bought Alkaline Water
customer_reviews.text: Being an alkaline water drinker for the past 5 years, I was skeptical to buy a home system. I normally purchase my water from a water store which has a commercial filtration system. This home system was easy to install and the flavor is just as good as the water store bought alkaline water. I have only been using this for the 3 days but I am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: G.G.Q.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality water filtration system.
customer_reviews.text: Easy installation and great quality filter. You can really taste the difference after trying the water filtered through here. I had this filter system for 6months and check the total dissolved solids (TDS) every month and same range from the day I installed it.

customer_reviews.title: Water tastes great
customer_reviews.text: We had a handyman install it, and it wasn't super fast or easy. But that's OK, it's the quality of the water that counts, and it is great! We had an initial issue with almost no water flow, but called customer service and they figured it out right away, very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Made our horrible water taste better than bottled water. Thank you APEC!!
customer_reviews.text: Took our private well water from being foul smelling and tasting due to sulfur/iron, which is now to now some of the best tasting water I've ever had. Honestly better than bottled water. Thank you, APEC!! Side note - I did mount mine in a basement closet below the kitchen sink. Worked perfectly, had to purchase some additional 1/4" OD tubing to reach up to the kitchen, the extra tubing from Menard's worked perfectly! Just be sure you do not get 1/4" ID (inner diameter), you want 1/4" OD (outer diameter).
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Good system that you can install yourself
customer_reviews.text: That's what it's supposed to do. so far it doesn't seem to be wasting a lot of water but I haven't had it long enough to really test it. You do have to know what you're doing to install it but if you take your time anyone should be able to accomplish it. The customer service is great when you need it.
customer_reviews.author: Ethan

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: I installed the system but eventually bypassed the last filter stage that adds minerals. Without the last filter stage the system converts 170 PPM tap water to 6 PPM water. With the last filter in place the water was 27 PPM, cloudy, and didn’t taste right. Good system for the money and not hard to install. I have used RO systems for 20 years and would recommend this system. Purchasing and installing yourself saves many hundreds of dollars over the retail vendors.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Wastes a lot of water
customer_reviews.text: The filter works well and the water tastes great but it flushes appx 8 gallons of water down the drain for every gallon of filtered water it makes. What a waste! (I collect the waste water in a 5 gallon pail and water my garden or flush the toilet with it but it's a bit of a hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Julia's Child

customer_reviews.title: Nice water filter
customer_reviews.text: It is a very good water filter, the water tastes very good and it is not so difficult to install, you just have to read the instructions very well. I only take very little time to install it, you only need a couple of tools and a drill. I recommend it for all those people who prefer a good water filter at home, instead of buying bottles or gallons of water, so you save time and money.
customer_reviews.author: Alfonso M.

customer_reviews.title: We had this unit professionally installed and it works great. The water tastes great
customer_reviews.text: We had this unit professionally installed and it works great. The water tastes great, I even had it hooked up to our ice maker! It's also perfect for the coffee maker and it filters water fast enough that we can easily fill a pot with water to boil pasta. I will be curious how easily it is to change the filters though as there are many connections and I did not install it. But as for its function it does what it claims to do and it does it well!
customer_reviews.author: Brick Wall

customer_reviews.title: Water tastes great, nickel faucet matches our sink
customer_reviews.text: We called a plumber to install which cost about $200, but it was worth it. We have well water that is very good water except for high nitrates, so we had this installed for better water for our family's health and development. It fit under our sink with room to spare. Very happy with this product!
customer_reviews.author: EV

customer_reviews.title: Such a good product, I bought 2!
customer_reviews.text: I sit on the board of directors of my local water authority. Our water is pretty good as is, but when I discovered that both my water service line and the authority's supply line were lead, I knew there was no way to replace them. Problem solved with the APEC system. Easy to install and no more lead worries. I also have a house in the city of Pittsburgh. The water authority there is in terrible shape, with lots of old lead supply lines and intermittent boil water orders. Bought another APEC system and again problem solved. BTW I think the extra $ is worth it for the optional remineralizer. Tastes great!
customer_reviews.author: Robert G. Steffes

customer_reviews.title: It works great!
customer_reviews.text: We live in town and this system made our water taste unbelievably better, plus know it adds back alkalinity, is a big bonus! Definitely recommend this product. Also only took a few supplies and maybe 2 hours to install. My husband was impressed with the ease of instalment.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Clark

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: This is fantastic!! Inexpensive for what you get. Water tested 0 for lead, chlorine, fluoride, nitrates, on and on!! PH of 8 no more buying Essentia water!! I’m a not handy girl and only needed help with the drain line! You will love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Lori Roth

customer_reviews.title: Awesome taste. Easy Installation.
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd one I've purchased. We bought one in our previous home. I can't imagine ever not owning one of these again. Taste is awesome. Installation is simple. The color coding of the tubing is a great idea and is easy to follow. Quick Tip 1: Don't use a standard masonry drill bit. Buy a 1/2" diamond-tipped hole saw. It'll cut your drill time by a factor of 10. Quick Tip 2: Use Plumber's Putty to build a little well around the drill area to fill with water. This keeps the bit cool while drilling.
customer_reviews.author: Fabian.S.

customer_reviews.title: Works great, happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this system in September 2016 to replace my old commercial unit which was 15 years old. I must say that the unit, although stated as used, was brand new out of the box. Installation was not as easy as reviews stated, which I anticipated anyway. Very pleased with the unit so far. I saved over $300 over the cost of our water specialist recommended unit. We expect continued savings each year with reduced filter replacement costs. If you're not handy around the house this you may find this difficult to install, don't be shy asking a friend for help. Recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy M Randell

customer_reviews.title: Better than bottle water.
customer_reviews.text: Replaced a five year old unit from a different company. The installation was very simple as I had most of the plumbing in place. Just after the one full cycle flushing the water cane out so sweet, I was so impressed. The TD meter reading was 24 ppm. On the previous unit I had to cycle few times before I could get 36 ppm.
customer_reviews.author: MNOLA

customer_reviews.title: Great Price, easy to install, super nice water

The water coming out of this system is great and I would recommend this system to any homeowner needing a under the sink RO system.

customer_reviews.title: Great setup for a great price

With this sized tank, the 3L bladder is filled up quickly, with no drop in pressure as it fills. I've since hooked it up to my refrigerator with built-in ice-maker. As for the water purification, it's clean, and I'm already feeling better. I think I'm even thinking more clearly now....yes, indeed more clearly.

customer_reviews.title: Worth it

To me, this is one of the ways you protect your family. I’m a doc, and know the risks of long term environmental exposures.

customer_reviews.title: I have told numerous people about this system and how easy it was to install

I have told numerous people about this system and how easy it was to install. I have honestly done 5 taste tests with neighbors and friends between the regular tap water and with the APEC system and they all picked APEC! I am so glad I purchased this for the health and well being of my family.

customer_reviews.text: Absolutely recommend this system for anyone looking for a RO filter system. Prior to installing this system the water hardness in my apartment was about 55 ppm. Not having to buy water bottles and create waste has also been a benefit.

product_meta.description:
The ROES-PH75 is a 6-stage 75 GPD reverse osmosis water filtration system that adds calcium minerals to enhance the water taste for people who prefer mineral water. This system's mineral cartridge adds only 100% US-made high-purity calcium carbonate to effectively raise pH in the water for those who desire alkaline water. Other re-mineralization reverse osmosis systems will claim to add various beneficial minerals back into the water; however, their mineral formulations are often from unknown and uncertified sources that can lead to potential health concern. With the ROES-PH75 RO system, users will enjoy unlimited great tasting healthy water right at home for drinking and cooking. Save money, time, and from buying costly, bottled water and live healthier with ultra-safe pure mineral water that is contaminant; worry free. Designed, engineered and assembled in the USA, this 6-stage water filtration system is ROES-PH75 system has been tested and certified to the highest standard in the industry- WQA gold seal, to guarantee the highest contaminant removal rates, giving you the purest water possible. Based off APEC's 20 years of experience in reverse osmosis systems design and production, this system will provide users with high-quality safe drinking water for many years to come. 1st Stage: High-capacity polypropylene sediment filter removes dust, particles, and rust. Protects and extends the life of the membrane and system. 2nd & 3rd Stage: Premium extruded carbon block gets rid of unpleasant chlorine, tastes, odors, cloudiness and colors. Also removes VOCs and other common chemicals from the water. 4th Stage: High Rejection TFC reverse osmosis membrane removes up to 99% of total dissolved solids (TDS - total dissolved solids) and contaminants such as arsenic, lead, fluoride, chromium, radium and much more. 5th Stage: Advanced coconut shell refining carbon filter (TCR - Total Contamination Removal) removes any possible residual taste from the tank. 6th Stage: PH+ alkaline re-mineralizing calcium filter adds calcium carbonate to increase water alkalinity.
